column5: Hey guys,  A friend of mine is looking for a father day fishing charter present for his dad.. they live out sarnia way and i was hoping someone here has had some luck finding a charter out that way.. can anyone recommend someone so i can point him in the right direction?  thanks much!
What species are you after? Is Windsor too far? If not give Bob Devine a call - he does Lake St. Clair/DR/Erie.
any species.. perferably walleye or salmon..  and windsor is too  far
for salmon ...drive up the coast a bit "Slow dancer" ( Marvin ) i think he is still out of Port Franks
Dang, if GaryV was still around, he could help you big time. RIP Gary.
